data.text: @AmySpiro Very astute of you, young lady
@AmySpiro Ivanka is a politician’s daughter. She is not the politician himself. Major distinction.
@AmySpiro @stronglang The homophobia crowd criticized Colbert for that. He still has a job, too, obvs.
@AmySpiro @Steven_Strauss It was all about the timing - cries for blood beget the same
@AmySpiro I think people instinctively feel that Ivanka isn't powerful enough to excuse that sort of language
@AmySpiro I don't want Samantha Bee to be fired over this. I still don't particularly like that she said it.
@AmySpiro I think it’s more of a timing thing.  Like an outrage rebound.

@AmySpiro Maybe I’m desensitized to so-called “vulgarity” but I really see nothing wrong with either joke.  Samantha Bee shouldn’t have apologized.  Ivanka is a grown woman, she doesn’t need to be protected against bad words.  Conservatives need to grow up.
LOL guys this was rhetorical. Unless you're @stronglang you are not an expert.

Signed, 
A slightly classier vulgar female without her own TV show.
@thenatureboiiii So vulgarity and personal insults are grounds for firing? They're basically the expectation of comedians...
